title: I lalthutthleng leh lallukhum i rawn kalsan
lyrics:
I lalthuthleng leh lallukhum i rawn kalsan,
Khawvela ka tan i lo kalin;
Nimahsela, Bethlehem-ah hmun a awm lo,
Nang, Mi Thianghlim pianna atan.

Aw Lalpa Isu, lo kal rawh,
I tan hmun ka thinlungah a awm'
Aw Lalpa Isu, lo kal thuai rawh,
I tan hmun ka thinlungah a awm.

Angel-ho zai mawiin van in chhung a khawk e,
I lal thupekte an puan laiin;
Nang erawh chu tlawm takin leiah i lo piang,
Bethlehem-ah bawng inah khan.

Sihalten kua an nei, savaten bu an nei,
Ramhnuaiah thingbuk hlimahte chuan;
Nang, Pathian Fa khum erawh chu hnim a ni,
Galili-a thlalerah khan.
